org.valid4j.matchers

Class ArgumentMatchers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.valid4j.matchers.ArgumentMatchers

  • public class ArgumentMatchers
extends Object
    Common convenience matchers for arguments

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> named(String name, org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> matcher)
      Wraps an existing matcher, decorating its description with the name specified.
      static org.hamcrest.Matcher<String> notEmptyString()
      A matcher matching non-null and non-empty strings

      Example: assertThat("this is not an empty string", notEmptyString())

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • named

        public static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> named(String name,
                                org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> matcher)
        Wraps an existing matcher, decorating its description with the name specified. All other functions are delegated to the decorated matcher, including its mismatch description.

        Example: 

        named("theNameOfMyArgument", notNullValue())
        Parameters:
        name - the given name of the wrapped matcher
        matcher - the matcher to decorate with a name

      • notEmptyString

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<String> notEmptyString()
        A matcher matching non-null and non-empty strings

        Example: 

        assertThat("this is not an empty string", notEmptyString())
